CustomField.description: Use with Ticket Type Sort Order. Specifies the field that is used to organize tickets on the registration page. Use "EventApi__Price__c" for price and "Name" for name.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Use with Ticket Type Sort Order. Specifies the field that is used to organize tickets on the registration page. Use "EventApi__Price__c" for price and "Name" for name.
CustomField.label: Ticket Type Sort Field
